name: Rock-a-Bye Shrimpie
description:
A 30 second two player versus arcade game where the goal is to rock the most baby shrimp to sleep in order to feed your Sea Creature. 

Julian Ceipek - Programming & Ideas

Christina Orcutt - Art, Ideas, & Concept

Joe Cox - Music

James Earl Cox III - Sound & Ideas

Bryan Pickens - Ideas & Concept

Patrick Quah - Concept

Thomas Lu - Ideas

Kylie Moses -Ideas

George Li -Ideas

Chao Chen - Ideas

Elliott Mahler - Ideas
